SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CoreForms_Vw] AS SELECT dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Ky, dbo.CoreForms.CoreEntities_Ky, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Custom, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Default, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Title, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Order, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_SQLFrom, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Code, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreModules_Ky, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Title, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_WhichFields, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Title, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Key, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Description, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_LabelSingular, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_LabelPlural, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Icon, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Config, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Order, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Tree, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_TreeAttribute, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_InMenu, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Code, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_AdminMenuTitle, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Order, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_LabelSingular, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_LabelPlural, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Icon, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Version, dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Active, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_CustomSave, dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_CustomDelete, dbo.CoreForms.CoreForms_Code FROM dbo.CoreForms INNER JOIN dbo.CoreEntities ON dbo.CoreForms.CoreEntities_Ky = dbo.CoreEntities.CoreEntities_Ky LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CoreModules ON dbo.CoreEntities.CoreModules_Ky = dbo.CoreModules.CoreModules_Ky
